name: Grocery Manufacturers Association
goal: Based in Washington, D.C., GMA is the voice of more than 300 leading food, beverage and consumer product companies that sustain and enhance the quality of life for hundreds of millions of people in the United States and around the globe. Founded in 1908, GMA is an active, vocal advocate for its member companies, and a trusted source of information about the industry and the products consumers rely on and enjoy every day. In keeping with its founding principles, GMA helps its members produce safe products through a strong and ongoing commitment to scientific research, testing and evaluation and to providing consumers with the products, tools and information they need to achieve a healthy diet and an active lifestyle.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Work with transnational food and beverage companies based in the EU.
Work on trade policy issues affecting EU companies and consumers.
